Good Game, But there is a bug inside a game with water reflections over all i like the game! you need to try your self :)

I really like Super Mario 64. The switch to 3D was done masterfully, with an almost perfect movement system with just the right amount of delay between each direction turned or jump made. The difficulty is also a very major plus, it doesn't hold your hand through the levels and gives you a challenge worth your time, when you die in the game it's almost never the game's fault.

Those are a few reasons why I like Super Mario 64, a masterpiece of gaming.
